user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mark'"'"'s recent inquiry about bank procedures (mark@trustwellbank.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments: {"query":"from:mark@trustwellbank.com subject:(procedure OR procedures) OR bank procedures OR teller","max_results":5,"include_snippet":true,"include_body":true}

formatted_items.content:
Here’s the information you asked for:

1. Latest email from Mark (21 Feb 2022, subject: “Inquiry about Bank Procedures”)
   • Key points:
     – He’s reviewing the orientation material and would like a clear, step-by-step guide for handling customer inquiries.  
     – Wants to know the official protocol for reporting issues.  
     – Asks if there are other resources or contacts that can help him become more familiar with these procedures.  
   • No attachments were included.

2. Most relevant Notion page
   • Page title: “Bank Procedures Overview”  
   • Link: https://www.notion.so/Bank-Procedures-Overview-2180dc8fa0db81cc9ec4f2eaa0e95e8e  
   • Last updated: 20 Jun 2025  
   • Pertinent details that address Mark’s questions:
     – Steps for handling customer inquiries: verify customer identity → process the request/transaction → note interaction in core banking system → thank the customer.  
     – Issue-reporting protocol: escalate first to the internal help desk (internal-help@trustwellbank.com); for urgent matters, branch managers’ phone numbers are listed in the “Regional Managers Contact List.”  
     – Additional resources: the help-desk email above, plus links in the page’s appendix to training videos and quick-reference flowcharts.

Concise combined summary you can send to Mark
“Hi Mark,  
Below are the core steps for handling customer inquiries and the protocol for reporting issues.  
1. Customer inquiries: (a) verify ID, (b) complete the request/transaction in the CBS, (c) document interaction, (d) thank the customer.  
2. Reporting issues: email internal-help@trustwellbank.com with details; escalate urgent matters directly to the branch manager listed in the Regional Managers Contact List.  
For further study, the ‘Bank Procedures Overview’ page in Notion has a flowchart and training video links.  
Let me know if anything needs more clarification.”

Let me know if you’d like me to send this outline to him or pull any additional materials.
